question:
You have recently moved to a different house.
Write a letter to an English speaking friend. In your letter

explain why you have moved
describe the new house
invite your friend to come and visit
Write at least 150 words.

You do NOT need to write any addresses.

Begin your letter as follows:

Dear ............,
text: I hope this letter finds you well. I am writing to tell you I have recently moved to a different house and invite you to my party.

In fact, my previous house was far from my work and  I had to dedicate two hours a day to commuting. In addition, it was small for us, especially since my child was born. Also, there were not many shops in our neighbourhood and sometimes I had to go to the city centre.

Therefore, I rented a house near my workplace and it just takes 15 minutes on foot to go there. Furthermore, it is far bigger than my last one. Indeed, it has a spacious living room and a well-equipped kitchen. It has two rooms, one of them is the bedroom and another one is my child's room. There is a garden in front of the building and I spend an hour each evening  gardening.
I am planning a party next Thursday and I will be glad if you can come.
I am longing to see you. Give your wife my regards.
